nodes.description: ANP集会自杀袭击：庆祝NWFP更名时，一名自杀式袭击者在集会现场引爆炸弹，导致45人死亡
nodes.support_text: Forty-five people were killed and over 100 others injured when a suicide bomber set off explosives strapped to his body at a rally organised by the ANP to celebrate the renaming of NWFP in Timergara, about 170km from Peshawar.

nodes.description: 美国领事馆遭汽车炸弹和RPG袭击：五名自杀式袭击者使用火箭弹和汽车炸弹攻击领事馆外围，造成51人死亡
nodes.support_text: Militants attacked a US Consulate in Peshawar with car bombs and grenades, hours after a suicide attack on a political rally in the region.

nodes.description: 领事馆排爆行动：安全人员成功拆解三个未爆的自杀式背心，发现高质TNT炸药
nodes.support_text: Two of the bombers still had live suicide jackets on them and BDS personnel later untangled wires and prima-cords and defused the bombs.

nodes.description: TTP宣称责任：TTP发言人声称袭击是对军事行动的报复，并威胁继续针对美国
nodes.support_text: TTP spokesman Azam Tariq called reporters in Miramshah, the headquarters of North Waziristan, and said the attack was a reaction to military operations and drone attacks in the tribal region.

nodes.description: ANP集会伤亡统计：医院接收36具尸体、80余名伤者，37人被空运至Peshawar
nodes.support_text: Thirty-seven critically injured people were later airlifted to Peshawar.

nodes.description: 领事馆周边二次爆炸：两辆汽车炸弹在领事馆附近引发爆炸，造成更多伤亡
nodes.support_text: two car bombs exploded — one at a checkpoint in Peshawar, about 50 metres from the US Consulate, and the other laden with about 100kg of explosives close to the consulate gate.

nodes.description: ANP安全批评：ANP工人指责现场警察和安保存在严重疏忽
nodes.support_text: The injured ANP workers criticised what they called negligence of police and security personnel deployed at the function and termed the incident a security lapse.

nodes.description: 政府及安全官员报告了自杀式爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: 政府及安全官员报告了自杀式爆炸事件
